name: Revoultion Lily ~Claire-sama's BERRY Special Birthday bash with Relaire!~
name_original: Revoultion Lily ~Claire-sama's BERRY Special Birthday bash with Relaire!~
description:
Touch Flies!

Revoultion Lily ~Claire-sama's BERRY Special Birthday bash with Relaire!~

It's a fan game of "I'm in Love with the Villainess Fan." that was created to celebrate Claire Francois's birthday. There are two different ending prepared, so please enjoy it!! Happy birthday, Claire-sama! ^-^
